statements: UPDATE fuel_efficiency_data SET fuel_economy = 30.5 WHERE vehicle_id = 123
UPDATE fuel_efficiency_data SET transmission = 'Automatic', fuel_type = 'Gasoline' WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota'
UPDATE fuel_efficiency_data SET fuel_economy = 30.5, manufacturer = 'Toyota' WHERE vehicle_id = 1
UPDATE fuel_efficiency_data SET model = 'Civic', transmission = 'Automatic' WHERE engine_size > 2.0
UPDATE vehicles SET year = 2022, make = 'Toyota' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE fuel_efficiency SET efficiency = distance_traveled / fuel_consumed WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE vehicles SET year = 2019, fuel_type = 'Diesel' WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND model = 'Camry'
UPDATE fuel_efficiency SET efficiency = distance_traveled / fuel_consumed WHERE date = '2022-09-15'
UPDATE vehicles SET fuel_efficiency = 30 WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
UPDATE fuel_consumption SET distance_traveled = 200 WHERE trip_id = 1;
UPDATE vehicles SET vehicle_make='Toyota', fuel_efficiency=30 WHERE vehicle_id=1;
UPDATE trips SET trip_distance=150.5, trip_duration=120 WHERE vehicle_id=1 and trip_id=100;
UPDATE vehicles SET mileage = 12500.75 WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE trips SET distance_traveled = 1200.5, fuel_consumed = 50.25 WHERE trip_id = 101;
UPDATE vehicles SET fuel_capacity = 60.5, mileage = 28.3 WHERE vehicle_id = 100
UPDATE fuel_prices SET price_per_gallon = 2.15, price_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE fuel_type_id = 3
UPDATE vehicles SET year = 2020, model = 'SUV' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE fuel_records SET fuel_date = '2021-10-15', fuel_volume = 12.5 WHERE record_id = 3;
UPDATE vehicles SET year = 2020, fuel_type = 'Electric' WHERE make = 'Tesla'
UPDATE fuel_records SET fuel_cost = 50.25, fuel_volume = 12.5 WHERE vehicle_id = 101
